title: Weekly Product Pulse: Nov 24-30, 2025
overview: This week's pulse shows user concern over core application stability, frequent glitches, and inconsistent financial data. High brokerage fees cause dissatisfaction. Customer support is mixed; AI is efficient, but human interaction is criticized for slowness.

themes.name: Glitches & Bugs
themes.summary: Users report frequent technical errors, including inconsistent financial data, unreliable option chains, and app crashes, especially during profit booking.

themes.name: Fees & Charges
themes.summary: Users express strong dissatisfaction with high and allegedly incorrect brokerage fees, impacting investment decisions due to new minimums.

themes.name: Customer Support
themes.summary: The AI assistant is efficient, but human call center interactions are criticized for slow response times and lengthy verification processes.

quotes: Too much glitch, option chain not open properly sometime working sometimes not working.
The whole process takes around 7â€“8 minutes. The speed should be faster.
actions: Prioritize resolution of critical technical bugs impacting data accuracy and core trading functions, especially app stability during profit booking.
Review and clarify brokerage and fee structures for transparency, addressing discrepancies and assessing the impact of new minimum fees.
Optimize human call center experience by streamlining verification and improving response times, learning from the AI Voice Assistant's success.
